sentence: Last month, Floridas governor, Ron DeSantis, special land use privileges the state gave to Disney for its Disney World theme park in Orlando after the company responding to backlash from employees and consumers spoke out against the states dont say gay? law.
author: Lauren Aratani
title: Corporate America buckles down for culture war on Roe v Wade

title: Why Many Brands Have Kept Their Voices Down on Roe v. Wade (So Far)
